reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Great professor who explains concepts well, but exams can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and helpful. Lectures are organized and clear.

reviews.subject: Algorithms
reviews.review: Interesting lectures but grades harshly. Make sure to study a lot.

reviews.subject: Database Systems
reviews.review: Expects too much for the time given, but assignments are useful for learning.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Engaging and passionate about AI. Clear explanations and great projects.

reviews.subject: Computer Networks
reviews.review: Solid professor. Lectures can be a bit dense, but assignments are helpful.

reviews.subject: Machine Learning
reviews.review: Fairly knowledgeable, but can go off-topic. Assignments are quite tough.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Best professor I've had! Makes programming enjoyable and easy to understand.
